name: Half Box
description:
A 2D Platform in which the goa- Ya no I'm not gonna do a Description like everyone else cuz I made this game with my own Humour.... haha Ik it's terrible :'D bUt ya so basically.. just a really terrible 2D platform game, where u just.... need to cross the entire level :D and.... get to...the...finish..line? or flag.... but ya...

It's my very first game I've ever made so plz... go easy on me... 

Much to learn I have - Yoda (idk when he said that) but ya... enjoy it? :]

You'll find out the controls in the game
